mapper.sql: id, code, name, sex, national_id, native_name, birth_place, birthday, education_name, political_name, health_status, retire_date, speciality, before_department, before_job_name, before_job_level_id, after_department_id, after_job_name, after_job_level_id, photo_id, address, hukou_address, photo, category
mapper.select:
SELECT t.id, t.code, t.name, t.sex, t.national_id, s.name as national_name, t.native_name, t.birth_place, t.birthday, t.education_name, t.political_name, t.health_status, t.retire_date, t.speciality, t.before_department, t.before_job_name, t.before_job_level_id, m.job_level as before_job_level_name, t.after_department_id, o.name as after_department_name, t.after_job_name, t.after_job_level_id, p.job_level as after_job_level_name, t.photo_id, t.address, t.hukou_address, t.photo, t.category FROM people_Rehire t LEFT JOIN dict_national s ON s.id = t.national_id LEFT JOIN job m ON m.id = t.before_job_level_id LEFT JOIN job p ON p.id = t.after_job_level_id LEFT JOIN dict_department o ON o.id = t.after_department_id
t.id = #{id}

select
from people_Rehire where name LIKE concat('%',#{name},'%')
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into people_Rehire (code, name, sex, national_id, native_name, birth_place, birthday, education_name, political_name, health_status, retire_date, speciality, before_department, before_job_name, before_job_level_id, after_department_id, after_job_name, after_job_level_id, photo_id, address, hukou_address, photo, category) values ( #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{nationalId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nativeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{educationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{politicalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{healthStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{retireDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{speciality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beforeDepartment, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beforeJobName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beforeJobLevelId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{afterDepartmentId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{afterJobName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{afterJobLevelId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{photoId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hukouAddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into people_Rehire (code, name, sex, national_id, native_name, birth_place, birthday, education_name, political_name, health_status, retire_date, speciality, before_department, before_job_name, before_job_level_id, after_department_id, after_job_name, after_job_level_id, photo_id, address, hukou_address, photo, category) values
( #{item.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.nationalId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.nativeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.birthPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.educationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.politicalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.healthStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.retireDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.speciality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.beforeDepartment, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.beforeJobName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.beforeJobLevelId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.afterDepartmentId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.afterJobName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.afterJobLevelId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.photoId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.hukouAddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.photo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.category, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
update people_Rehire
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT},
national_id = #{nationalId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
native_name = #{nativeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birth_place = #{birthPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
education_name = #{educationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
political_name = #{politicalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
health_status = #{healthStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
retire_date = #{retireDate,jdbcType=DATE},
speciality = #{speciality,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
before_department = #{beforeDepartment, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
before_job_name = #{beforeJobName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
before_job_level_id = #{beforeJobLevelId, jdbcType=INTEGER},
after_department_id = #{afterDepartmentId, jdbcType=INTEGER},
after_job_name = #{afterJobName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
after_job_level_id = #{afterJobLevelId, jdbcType=INTEGER},
photo_id = #{photoId, jdbcType=INTEGER},
address = #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hukou_address = #{hukouAddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
category = #{category, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select t.id, t.code, t.name, t.sex, t.national_id, t.native_name, t.birth_place, t.birthday, t.education_name, t.political_name, t.health_status, t.retire_date, t.speciality, t.before_department, t.before_job_name, t.before_job_level_id, t.after_department_id, t.after_job_name, t.after_job_level_id, t.photo_id, t.address, t.hukou_address, t.photo, t.category from people_Rehire t where id in
#{item}

SELECT t.id, t.code, t.name, t.sex, t.national_id, s.name as national_name, t.native_name, t.birth_place, t.birthday, t.education_name, t.political_name, t.health_status, t.retire_date, t.speciality, t.before_department, t.before_job_name, t.before_job_level_id, m.job_level as before_job_level_name, t.after_department_id, o.name as after_department_name, t.after_job_name, t.after_job_level_id, p.job_level as after_job_level_name, t.photo_id, t.address, t.hukou_address, t.photo, t.category FROM people_Rehire t LEFT JOIN dict_national s ON s.id = t.national_id LEFT JOIN job m ON m.id = t.before_job_level_id LEFT JOIN job p ON p.id = t.after_job_level_id LEFT JOIN dict_department o ON o.id = t.after_department_id where t.id in
#{item}
